traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.

participant_2.background:
I started working at a convenience store until I found a new job in my field.
I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
i need certain medications to live.
my favorite place is the mountains.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1, how are you today?
Good, I'm participant_2. I'm a bit tired from work, but otherwise I'm doing well.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse at a local hospital.
That must be really rewarding, but it can be tiring.
It is, but it's also very challenging and exciting.
That's great. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go hiking in the mountains, it helps me clear my head.
That sounds really nice. I love the mountains. I like to go running, it also helps me clear my head.
That's cool. What do you like to do with your dogs?
I take them to the park a lot, and I also like to play fetch with them.
That sounds really fun. I love dogs.
